WorkItem.ClosedComment: We have what you actually need in there as Avoided Attacks % on the optimizer restraints
WorkItem.Description:
Right now, the only option we have for hit is increasing the threat value. For expertise, that and selecting parry haste.
 
What I'm requesting is a checkbox allowing for "expertise dodge cap", and also for "hit cap", specially the former.
 
The main difference is that, when you increase the threat value, it will increase the importance of agility, attack power etc. With these overrides, only hit rating and expertise are affected.

Comments.Message: (Also, make sure you understand that optimizing for exp is always a terrible thing to do right now, and that optimizing for hit is a terrible thing to do as well in all cases except for when you're required to interrupt in a 10man and have exhausted all other raidcomp possibilities).

Yup. I don't optimize for expertise at all (I just carry an expertise trinket for 5man heroics). Our 10man group relies heavily on me being able to interrupt, so I have to be hit capped. No worries there.
